name: Car Theft Escape
description:
Join special police squad and enjoy adventures police car gangster chase missions to secure town from street criminals. Let’s Move & arrest the most wanted criminals with crime control police squad. Drive police car to chase down criminals and arrest gangster vehicles

Game Features:
• Police car Gangster Car Chasing Missions
• Police Sargent Heavy cars Driving & Drifting
• Find, Identify and Chase city criminals
• Extreme Thrilling and Challenging Missions
• Interesting Game Play in Amazing City Environment
• Smooth and Intuitive Controls of Police Heavy car
• Police Siren, Lights & Multiple Camera Views
• Stunning & High Quality 3d Graphics with Amazing Sounds
